Reviews.Title: “Not bad for a quick stay”

Reviews.Content: stayed late midweek match emirates looks okay front nice views park location 10 minutes walk nearest tube station friend stayed twin outside wing looked bb sort impressions incredibly single beds wardrobe chest draws little walking space theres tv tiny channels mixed kettle tea bags coffee sugar etc etc christ milk beds comfortable sleep preety bathroom tiny clean sink hand basin shower people trouble standing jet 6 footer worst bathroom cold tap ran hot cold water warning cold icon top tap removed impossible wash overall id okayish quick overnight stay youre planning staying london pay extra somewere service 5 star rating blonde reception gorgeous
